ManyPrimates 1: Short-Term Memory

Background

The first ManyPrimates project will investigate short-term memory across primates. As such, it is a continuation of our pilot study. We hope to increase the number of species and individuals per species in order to make meaningful inferences about the evolution of short-term memory abilities in the primate lineage.

Status

We are currently working on the preregistration for the second round of data collection. If you would like to be part of this process, please get in touch.

Contact

We encourage everyone who is interested in primate cognition to get involved. Access to primates is NOT a prerequisite.
